sentence.Network_en: Many of these poets appeared in print only long after their deaths.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些诗人中有很多都是在去世很久以后作品才得以发表的。

sentence.Network_en: There are many minor and obscure poets in the age of Elizabeth.
sentence.Network_cn: 伊丽莎白时代有许多不知名的诗人.

sentence.Network_en: Many poets and artists have drawn their inspiration from nature.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多诗人和艺术家从大自然中获得灵感.
